Container.Name: PasswordPusherEphemeral
Container.Overview:
PasswordPusher or PWPush is an opensource application to communicate passwords over the web. Links to passwords expire after a certain number of views and/or time has passed. Go ahead. Email another password. Or... Securely communicate passwords over the web.
Ephemeral version requires no other database container.
